# Clipped Image

You can achieve image clipping effects under various shapes through the background image of the Shape element.

## Code Demonstration

```javascript livedemo template=vstory
VStory.registerAll();

const story = new VStory.Story(null, { dom: CONTAINER_ID, background: '#18253A' });
const player = new VStory.Player(story);
story.init(player);
const clipPath = [
  // Built-in shapes
  'circle',
  'star',
  'diamond',
  'cross',
  // Simple path
  'M0 -0.5 L0.433 -0.25 L0.433 0.25 L0 0.5 L-0.433 0.25 L-0.433 -0.25 Z',
  'm-.42 0c-.09-.12-.08-.29.03-.39.11-.11.27-.12.39-.03.12-.09.29-.08.39.03.11.11.12.27.03.39.09.12.08.29-.03.39-.11.11-.27.12-.39.03-.12.09-.29.08-.39-.03-.11-.11-.12-.27-.03-.39z',
  'm.41 0c.05-.02.08-.09.06-.15-.02-.06-.08-.1-.14-.09.03-.05.01-.12-.04-.15-.05-.04-.12-.03-.16.01-.01-.06-.06-.1-.13-.1s-.12.04-.13.1c-.04-.04-.11-.05-.16-.01-.05.04-.07.1-.04.15-.06-.01-.12.03-.14.09-.02.06.01.12.06.15-.05.02-.08.09-.06.15.02.06.08.1.14.09-.03.05-.01.12.04.15.05.04.12.03.16-.01.01.06.06.1.13.1s.12-.04.13-.1c.04.04.11.05.16.01.05-.04.07-.1.04-.15.06.01.12-.03.14-.09.02-.06-.01-.12-.06-.15z',
  'M-.36-.14C-.3-.17-.19-.21-.06-.24-.05-.25-.05-.25-.05-.25-.13-.22-.21-.18-.28-.14-.33-.12-.37-.09-.41-.06-.44-.03-.48.02-.48.1-.48.13-.47.16-.46.19-.44.22-.41.24-.39.24-.37.25-.34.25-.32.25-.33.26-.35.26-.36.27-.36.28-.38.29-.39.31-.39.33-.4.35-.4.37-.4.4-.39.43-.38.44-.36.46-.33.47-.33.47L-.33.47C-.32.47-.31.48-.3.48-.28.48-.26.48-.24.47-.06.46.08.45.16.45.21.45.24.45.26.45.27.45.28.45.28.45.28.45.29.45.29.45L.29.45.29.45C.29.45.29.45.29.35.3.25.3.25.3.25L.3.25.3.25.3.25.29.25C.29.25.29.25.29.25.28.25.27.25.26.25.24.25.21.25.17.25.23.22.28.19.33.17.37.14.41.11.44.07.46.05.47.02.48-.02.48-.06.47-.1.45-.13.42-.17.38-.19.35-.2.36-.2.38-.21.39-.23.4-.24.43-.27.43-.33.43-.39.39-.42.38-.43.36-.44.34-.45.32-.46.2-.5.04-.48-.09-.44-.23-.41-.36-.36-.43-.32L-.36-.14ZM.33.01C.33.01.33.01.33.01.33.01.33.01.33.01.33.01.33.01.33.01ZM.32-.07C.32-.07.32-.07.32-.07.32-.07.32-.07.32-.07.32-.07.32-.07.32-.07ZM-.31.11C-.31.11-.31.11-.31.11-.31.11-.31.11-.31.11Z',
  // Various polygons
  'M0-.48.11-.3.31-.36.28-.15.48-.07.32.07.42.26.21.27.17.48 0 .35-.17.48-.21.27-.42.26-.32.07-.48-.07-.28-.15-.31-.36-.11-.3 0-.48z',
  'M0 -0.5 L0.25 -0.433 L0.433 -0.25 L0.5 0 L0.433 0.25 L0.25 0.433 L0 0.5 L-0.25 0.433 L-0.433 0.25 L-0.5 0 L-0.433 -0.25 L-0.25 -0.433 Z',
  'm.4531.0346c0-.0067.001-.0125.001-.0192l.0125-.0538.0134-.0566-.0355-.0461-.0288-.0374c-.0029-.0058-.0058-.0125-.0086-.0182L.3926-.2496l-.0144-.0557-.0528-.024-.0384-.0173-.0307-.0384-.0365-.0451-.0586 0-.048 0c-.0067-.0019-.0134-.0029-.0202-.0048l-.0499-.0211L-.0106-.48l-.0518.0269-.0422.0221c-.0067.0019-.0134.0038-.0202.0058l-.0547.0048-.0576.0048-.0326.048-.0269.0394c-.0048.0048-.0096.0086-.0144.0134l-.0461.0298-.049.0317-.0067.0576-.0048.047c-.0029.0067-.0048.0134-.0067.0202L-.4512-.0826l-.0288.0509.0211.0538.0173.0442c.001.0067.0019.0134.0029.0202l-.001.0547-.001.0576.0442.0374.0365.0307c.0038.0058.0077.0106.0125.0154l.025.049.0259.0518.0566.0125.0461.0096c.0067.0029.0125.0058.0192.0086l.0442.0317.047.0336.0557-.0154.0461-.0134c.0067 0 .0134-.001.0192-.001l.0547.0067.0576.0077.0422-.0403.0346-.0326c.0058-.0029.0002-.0067.0004-.0106l.0518-.0192.0547-.0202.0182-.0547.0154-.0451c.0038-.0058.0067-.0115.0106-.0173L.432.1824l.0384-.0432-.0096-.0576L.4531.0346z',
  'm.4387.0902c0-.001 0-.0019.001-.0029l.0134-.0144.0269-.0298-.023-.0336-.0086-.0125c0-.001 0-.0019 0-.0029l.0106-.0173.0202-.0346-.0298-.0269-.0115-.0106c0-.001 0-.0019-.001-.0029l.0067-.0192.0125-.0384-.0346-.0211-.0134-.0077c0-.001-.001-.0019-.001-.0029l.0019-.0202.0038-.0394-.0384-.0134-.0144-.0048c-.001-.001-.001-.0019-.0019-.0019l-.0019-.0202-.0029-.0394-.0403-.0048-.0154-.0019c-.001-.001-.001-.001-.0019-.0019l-.0067-.0192-.0125-.0384-.0403.0038-.0154.001c-.001 0-.0019-.001-.0029-.001l-.0096-.0173-.0192-.0355-.0384.0115-.0144.0048c-.001 0-.0019-.001-.0029-.001l-.0134-.0154-.0269-.0298-.0355.0192-.0134.0077c-.001 0-.0019 0-.0029 0l-.0163-.0115-.0326-.024-.0307.0259-.0115.0106c-.001 0-.0019 0-.0029 0l-.0182-.0077-.0289-.0163-.024.0317-.0096.0125c-.001 0-.0019.001-.0029.001l-.0192-.0048-.0394-.0086-.0173.0365-.0067.0144c-.001.001-.0019.001-.0029.001l-.0202 0-.0403 0-.0086.0394-.0038.0154c-.001.001-.001.001-.0019.0019l-.0202.0038-.0394.0086-.001.0403 0 .0154c0 0 0 .001-.001.001l-.0182.0086-.0365.0163.0077.0394.0029.0154c0 .001-.001.0019-.001.0029l-.0163.0115-.0336.023.0154.0365.0058.0144c0 .001 0 .0019-.001.0029l-.0134.0144-.0259.0298.023.0336.0086.0125c0 .001 0 .0019 0 .0029l-.0106.0173-.0192.0346.0298.0269.0115.0106c0 .001 0 .0019.001.0029l-.0067.0192-.0125.0384.0346.0211.0134.0077c0 .001.001.0019.001.0029l-.0019.0202-.0038.0394.0384.0134.0144.0048c.001.001.001.0019.0019.0019l.0019.0202.0038.0394.0403.0048.0154.0019c.001.001.001.001.0019.0019l.0067.0192.0125.0384.0403-.0038.0154-.001c.001 0 .0019.001.0029.001l.0096.0173.0202.0346.0384-.0115.0144-.0048c.001 0 .0019.001.0029.001l.0134.0144.0269.0298.0355-.0192.0134-.0077c.001 0 .0019 0 .0029 0l.0163.0115.0326.024.0307-.0259.0115-.0106c.001 0 .0019 0 .0029 0l.0182.0086.0365.0163.024-.0317.0096-.0125c.001 0 .0019-.001.0029-.001l.0202.0038.0394.0086.0173-.0365.0067-.0144c.001-.001.0019-.001.0029-.001l.0202 0 .0403 0 .0086-.0394.0038-.0154c.001-.001.001-.001.0019-.0019l.0202-.0038.0394-.0086.001-.0403 0-.0154c.001-.001.001-.001.0019-.0019l.0134-.0058.0365-.0163-.0077-.0394-.0029-.0154c0-.001.001-.0019.001-.0029l.0163-.0115.0326-.023-.0154-.0365-.0058-.0144z'
];

clipPath.forEach((path, index) => {
  story.addCharacter(
    {
      type: 'Shape',
      id: `clipedImage_${index}`,
      zIndex: 1,
      position: {
        top: 50 + Math.floor(index / 4) * 150,
        left: 50 + Math.floor(index % 4) * 150,
        width: 100,
        height: 100
      },
      options: {
        graphic: {
          symbolType: path,
          fill: false,
          stroke: false,
          background: 'https://lf9-dp-fe-cms-tos.byteorg.com/obj/bit-cloud/vstory/clip-image-demo.png'
        }
      }
    },
    {
      sceneId: 'defaultScene',
      actions: [
        {
          action: 'appear',
          startTime: 0,
          payload: [
            {
              animation: {
                duration: 1000,
                easing: 'linear'
              }
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    }
  );
});

player.play(-1);

window['story'] = story;
window['vstory'] = story;
```
